SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers

Class CommonGoalsPointsManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers.PointsManager
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers.CommonGoalsPointsManager
public class CommonGoalsPointsManager extends PointsManager
A PointsManager that handles all the common goals, which are goals that anyone can fulfill, this PointsManager takes into account both the points and the edited bookshelf state returned from the pattern

  • Method Details

    • updatePoints

      public void updatePoints(Player player)
      updates the points of the given player the same bookshelf MUST be used to check every pattern function because if the pattern function wants to remove the tiles that activated it, it should be able to (this is the case, as example, for the adjacent pattern)
      Specified by:
      updatePoints in class PointsManager
      Parameters:
      player - the player to update
